import type { Config } from 'drizzle-kit';
export default { schema: './src/db/schema.ts', out: './drizzle', driver: 'mysql2', dbCredentials: { uri: process.env.DATABASE_URL! } } satisfies Config;

import { mysqlTable, serial, varchar } from 'drizzle-orm/mysql-core';
export const users = mysqlTable('users', { id: serial('id').primaryKey(), email: varchar('email', { length: 255 }).notNull() });
